column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////honestly one of the best brunch spots I've been to. I'm from California so I'm used to overpriced
column3: so the food here was much cheaper and fresher than I'm used to. We got the signature pancakes
column6: which were all perfect. My family and I came here two days in a row bc that's how much we liked it! Service was also really standout. The only thing is the wait
column7: but if you get past that you'll get a great brunch
